General.Name: Hi-Clearance
General.Description: Hi-Clearance Inc. supplies medical devices for the renal, cardiac, radiation, dental, oral surgery, and metabolism markets in Taiwan. The company offers dialyzers, dialysis and RO machines, and related consumables and drugs; interventional cardiology and radiology, and vascular surgery devices; dental consumables, implant materials, and equipment; and blood glucose monitors, and related consumables and nutrition products, as well as hemodialysis management services. It also engages in the design and management of dialysis centers; and sale and service of healthy and natural drinks, as well as operates as an OEM supplier for beverage raw materials and concentrates. The company was founded in 1989 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
General.Address: No. 2, Chung Hsin Road, Taipei, Taiwan, 241
